Coal LLC gameplay with Orbital Potato! You work for an evil mining organisation. With only a shoddy pickaxe to start, you must fulfil your quotas for coal each day, growing and hiring employees to reach your goals. Each day is a race to mine as much and as deeply as you can - as on nightfall your quotas must be met and your mine will reset. Deep underground, dungeons and treasure awaits you. Ancient secrets from long-lost civilisations can unlock tools, equipment and even biblical powers to grow your coal mining empire.
